channel.title: Dreamies® Video Art Politics Satire.
channel.description: Political satire, video art mix it up in surreal one minute movies by Bill Holt.
channel.itunes:subtitle: USA World News Today Theater™. A surreal look at current events.
channel.itunes:summary: Videoart political satire humor politics mix it up in surreal one minute movies by Bill Holt. Inspired by "Dreaming Is A Private Thing". A 1955 short story by sci-fi legend Isaac Asimov, featuring Jesse Weill who markets "dreamies", dream sequences that can be conveyed to others.
channel.itunes:author: Bill Holt
